sentences.en: A recent study showed that gardening is easily the most popular activity among the over 50s.
sentences.cn: 最近的一项研究表明园艺绝对是50岁以上人群中最受欢迎的活动。

sentences.en: He is one of the most wanted criminals in Europe.
sentences.cn: 他是欧洲最重要的通缉犯之一。

sentences.en: he was eager to make the most of his visit.
sentences.cn: 他渴望能充分利用好这次访问。

sentences.en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentences.cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

sentences.en: I believe he is most painfully anxious about Diana.
sentences.cn: 我相信他肯定非常担心黛安娜。

sentences.en: I think I've got one of the most stressful jobs there is.
sentences.cn: 我想我得到的这份工作是其中最繁重的工作之一。

sentences.en: If the company was to relocate, most employees would move.
sentences.cn: 如果这个公司要搬迁，多数员工也要搬家。

sentences.en: It is the kind of tea most often served in Chinese restaurants.
sentences.cn: 这是中国餐馆里最常用的茶。

sentences.en: Lloyd George was most anxious to be agreeable and pleasant.
sentences.cn: 劳埃德·乔治极力想表现得平易近人、和蔼亲切。

sentences.en: Mark was condemned to do most of the work.
sentences.cn: 马克被迫承担大部分工作。

sentences.en: Most of our flights have a baggage allowance of 44lbs per passenger.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数航班行李限重为每位乘客44磅。

sentences.en: Most of the wine was unfit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 这些酒中大部分都不适于人类饮用。

sentences.en: She seemed to be placing most of the blame on her mother.
sentences.cn: 她好像把大部分责任都推到了母亲身上。

sentences.en: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.cn: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

sentences.en: The area where most refugees are waiting is exposed to the elements.
sentences.cn: 大多数难民等待救济的地方都不能挡风遮雨。

sentences.en: The crowd moved indoors for what were deemed the most desirable items.
sentences.cn: 人群为了被视为最值得拥有的物品涌入屋里。

sentences.en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
sentences.cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

sentences.en: The most important thing is to stay calm.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是保持冷静。

sentences.en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentences.cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentences.en: the older members, for the most part, shun him.
sentences.cn: 年长的会员通常会避开他。

sentences.en: The president himself won the most votes.
sentences.cn: 总统本人赢得了最多的选票。

sentences.en: We are in one of the most severe recessions in modern times.
sentences.cn: 我们正在经历现代最严重的一段经济衰退。

sentences.en: We saw him for ten minutes at the most. She ran two miles at most.
sentences.cn: 我们能见他十分钟。她最多跑了两英里

sentences.en: We shall find out which system works most effectively.
sentences.cn: 我们要找出哪个系统效率最高。

sentences.en: Which class has the most children in it?
sentences.cn: 哪个班级孩子最多？

phrases.tran_cn: 最重要的；首要的；最关键的
大部分，大多数的；绝大多数
绝大部分时间，在很多时候
最经常；很多时候；通常来说
最尊敬的大主教大人（大主教的尊称）
最有价值球员；最优秀选手

trans.tran_en: You use the most to mean a larger amount than anyone or anything else, or the largest amount possible

trans.tran_cn: 最，最多（大），much的最高级，非常，很，几乎
trans.tran_en: having the greatest amount of a particular quality
a larger amount or number than anyone or anything else

trans.tran_cn: 最大限度，大部分，大多数人
trans.tran_en: nearly all of the people or things in a group, or nearly all of something
